description: Gently spiced and nourishing, this dish is just right for weeknight dinners with leftovers for lunches.
name: Mixed Vegetable & Lentil Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with coarsely chopped coriander, serve hot in a shallow bowl with flat bread or rice.
